title: Google details ‘Immersive Stream for Games,’ Stadia’s B2B offering for other gaming companies
content:
Google is officially unveiling “Immersive Stream for Games,” the service to let companies offer Stadia-powered game streaming directly to their customers.

more…

The post Google details ‘Immersive Stream for Games,’ Stadia’s B2B offering for other gaming companies appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google is unveiling "Immersive Stream for Games," service to let companies offer Stadia-powered game streaming directly to their customers.
